parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: A token to access this route

schema.description: A token to access this route

post.description: Deploy an already existing deployment by id

decimals.description: The number of decimals in the token

gasPrice.description: The gas unit price to pay for each deployment/contract operation

owners.description: The owners addresses of the multisig contract

requiredConfirmations.description: The amount of signers that are required to execute a multisig contract transaction

chainId.description: The chainId of the network to deploy. By default is 1 = ETHEREUM MAINNET
